displayName.description: The display name of the brand submitted via bulk creation.
displayName.title: Displayname

status.description: The current status of the brand.

brandId.description: The ID of the brand created via bulk creation. This brand will only have a brandId after the brand has been created.
brandId.title: Brandid

created_at.description: The date and time that the brand was created.
created_at.title: Created At

error.description: Errors related to a brand creation failure.
error.title: Error
